mapper.select:
SELECT distinct s.id as oir_id,
a.id as opd_id, a.group_no, d.sign_code, d.visit_id, c.name, c.gender_code, c.age, c.age_unit_code, b.crte_time, s.crte_time as register_time,
d.exec_id, d.exec_time, d.exec_name, (SELECT name FROM base_dept where id =d.exec_dept_id and hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as exec_dept_name, d.second_exec_id, d.second_exec_name, d.is_print, d.remark, a.content, a.item_name, a.spec, a.num, a.num_unit_code, a.dosage, a.dosage_unit_code, a.usage_code, b.doctor_name FROM outpt_infusion_register s left join outpt_prescribe_detail a on s.opd_id = a.id and s.hosp_code = a.hosp_code left JOIN outpt_prescribe b on a.op_id = b.id and a.visit_id = b.visit_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left JOIN outpt_visit c on a.visit_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code left JOIN outpt_prescribe_exec d on a.id = d.opd_id and a.visit_id = d.visit_id and d.hosp_code = a.hosp_code where a.hosp_code = #{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.hospCode} and a.exec_num > 0 and b.is_settle = '1' and b.is_cancel = '0'
and a.usage_code in
#{item}
and c.dept_id = #{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.loginDeptId}
and (c.name like CONCAT('%',#{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.keyword},'%') or c.visit_no like CONCAT('%',#{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.keyword},'%'))
and d.sign_code = #{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.type}
and b.crte_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and b.crte_time <= DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{outptPrescribeDetailsDTO.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 day)
order by s.crte_time desc,b.crte_time desc

update.foreach:
update outpt_prescribe_detail
exec_id = #{item.execId},
exec_name = #{item.execName},
exec_date = #{item.execTime},
where 1=1 and hosp_code = #{item.hospCode} and id = #{item.opdId}

update outpt_prescribe_exec
sign_code = #{item.signCode},
exec_id = #{item.execId},
exec_name = #{item.execName},
exec_time = #{item.execTime},
second_exec_id = #{item.secondExecId},
second_exec_name = #{item.secondExecName},
where 1=1 and hosp_code = #{item.hospCode}
and id = #{item.id}
